Uses of Interface
ml.alternet.parser.EventsHandler

  • Packages that use EventsHandler 
    Package Description
    ml.alternet.parser
    Allow to design grammar, parse input and generate a custom data structure.
    ml.alternet.parser.ast
    Helper classes to build an abstract syntax tree.
    ml.alternet.parser.handlers
    Various handlers.

    • Uses of EventsHandler in ml.alternet.parser

      Subinterfaces of EventsHandler in ml.alternet.parser 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Handler
      Events receiver when a grammar is parsing an input with rewind capabilities (mark, consume/cancel).

      Parse an input with the main rule of this grammar.

    • Uses of EventsHandler in ml.alternet.parser.handlers

      Subinterfaces of EventsHandler in ml.alternet.parser.handlers 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataHandler<T>
      A handler that can supply a data after parsing.
      Classes in ml.alternet.parser.handlers that implement EventsHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HandlerAccumulator
      An accumulator stores all the events it receives.
      class  HandlerBuffer
      A rewindable accumulator that can be flushed to a target handler.
      class  SysoutHandler
      Just print the received events.
      class  TokensCollector<T>
      A handler that collect tokens.
      class  TreeHandler<T>
      A tree handler builds a target data structure while parsing.
      Methods in ml.alternet.parser.handlers with parameters of type EventsHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void HandlerAccumulator.emitAll(EventsHandler handler)
      Emit all accumulated events to a target handler and remove them from this accumulator.
